start:
Welcome! I'm your Hydrax video uploader bot.

Send me videos or direct links to upload them to Hydrax.
help:
📋 **Help Menu**

• Send videos or direct links to upload to Hydrax
• /list - View processing queue
• /setlang - Change language
• /server - Check current server
• /ping - Check bot latency
• /cancel - Cancel current uploads
not_authorized: ❌ You are not authorized to use this bot.
ads_prompt: 📢 Send me the announcement you want to broadcast:
ads_sent:
✅ Announcement sent to {success} users
❌ Failed to send to {failed} users
🚫 {blocked} users blocked the bot
hydrax_api_prompt: 🔑 Send me your Hydrax API key:
hydrax_api_confirm:
🔑 Are you sure this API key is correct?

{api_key}
